title: How bout those Singed buffs?
body:
Singed
Fling (  ! ) damage lowered to 50/65/80/95/110 from 80/125/170/215.
Fling (  ! ) now also deals 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% of targets Maximum health (max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters)

I'm loving it.

replies.body: Still don't understand why they can't cap Kalista's rend damage
Because she has to set up for it? It's different.
But doing 3k damage to Dragon or Baron just by building attack speed and pressing E is highly annoying. And it makes our smite steal if possible completely worthless.

It's the fault of those idiots begging Riot to keep some strategic decisions in the game. How the hell are we even supposed to play if we can't beat our opponent just by having a faster reaction time?

*Sarcasm self-test complete.*
Oh good, that's online again.
i think the person with the summoner spell dedicated to objective control should be able to contest objectives

They can, they just have to go about it differently. Get Kalista and/or her team off the objective, instead of waiting until it's time to smite it and hoping you're faster. Nunu, Cho'Gath, and Kalista all make a smite-steal nigh impossible; one of them just happens to be an adc.

well, didn't think about it that way but you're right

guess i need to get good
I'm not saying it shouldn't have a cap, but it's still different.
Dam. why gotta cap it on monsters like dat? I wanna play jungle singed.
410 max base damage to monsters is still better than 215 base damage to monsters, and it still has an AP ratio.
Cause 8% max hp against Baron would be overkill

You use fling for the fling. Not as a nuke.

Singed suffers a lot from being kited and poked. If he does ACTUALLY manage to run up to you and fling without getting CCd before etc. he should be rewarded.
Honestly it also saves singed from one of his MANY weaknesses, high HP pools. He cant burst, but with this item and a Liandries he can do some considerable damage to tanks.

It's nice that Riot is looking at Singed, but really, the only thing he need is the tenacity back on his ult.

It's too easy to kite/deny him now in league of ultra mobility.
I dont know why they took that away. He wasnt even that overbearing.
This
MY JUNGLE SINGED DREAMS SHALL BE REALIZED!!!

Why the hell does his fling need a buff?

Why does he need a buff at all?
You're kidding right?

No I am not. For a champion that just runs around and poisons people I don't understand why his E has to do percent health now.

He doesn't need any buff, he isn't lacking in any of the areas he is best at.

One of the problems, though, is that his area of expertise is super-ultra-mega niche.  He's a bit better than he was, and he WAS just a champion that overall isn't as effective or worthwhile for your team.

Yes but this is a problem with his role and kit in general, not him lacking some damage on his E
They just made it easier to root people with his E and W that's plenty of a buff, it buffs what he already does, giving his E percent health is just stupid.
You mean the super difficult but barely rewarding root that you have to land on the many people with multiple dashes while having none of your own? I'll take any singed buffs I can get.

A damage buff isn't going to do anything about that, and Singed can up his movement speed, and most players build MS and take ghost too. 

Again, Buffing the damage on his E so much won't fix anything.

A mild increase in his speed wont help him chase people who can dash, if it did, more people would run ghost over flash. Although this buff doesnt fix ALL of singed many problems, its a step in the right direction.

Ghost plus his ult, plus the MS items Singed players take. Dashing or not they can't dash forever and Singed WILL catch them, especially if he knows how to land his W.

And what problems does he have? His only job is to run around and be an annoying pain in the ass, which he excels at greatly.
lack of burst, lack of stickiness to anyone with a dash. Lack of cc for a tank. Lack of initiate. They dash over a wall, he cant follow. Boom, singed averted.

Oh I'm sorry I thought a flip, root, and slow were CC.
Not every champion needs burst, doesn't need stickiness, simply outruns people with or without dashes. 

Dashing over a wall? Very few mobile champions can go over walls with their abilities, and if you mean flash, then that crappy logic applies to every champion in the game.

{{champion:266}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:92}} 

The rest either have to use their ult, can't get over walls (see {{champion:104}} {{champion:236}} )  Or require a ward or target to jump too.

And might I remind you this is a small amount of champions in the massive pool of over 120 champions.

Lets not forget Riven or Liss for example have a delay before they go over and can have it interupted by his E

Maybe you don't understand the greatness of wasting an enemies ult, ward, or flash but I say just running at someone to get them to burn any of those is more then worth it.


Singed doesn't get played because he is boring, if you had to make a vote on the forums for the most boring champion to play he would get picked, yes the first few games you might get a chuckle at what you are doing, but he becomes so repetitive and obnoxious to play as. Oh look you are going to run around this team fight and watch morons chase you, or smart people ignore you and kill the rest of your team.

Oh right {{champion:54}} {{champion:84}} must have slipped your mind.

And didn't even comment on the fact most of those required a target.

Also how many small walls exist? just the few on the river, where most fights don't take place in the first place.

And you are lightly noting how he is "gradual" when in reality he can slow you and speed himself up significantly, and as someone who supposedly plays Singed a lot, you should have witnessed this, I know I have. 

Vayne maybe, Darius? Yeah he will keep up I am sure.
Cho Gath can chunk him, but considering it isn't uncommon to have massive health on Singed, it wouldn't matter much.

Only one who has to use his ult to leap over walls is Kassadin. The rest have it as a basic ability. Also Graves AND lucian CAN leap over small walls. If people chase you all the time and dont know how to use their basic abilities to escape from gradual moving dot monster then please, continue, I love seeing a successful singed, He's my favorite character hands down, but Literally ALL of the champions I mentioned make short work of Singed, not to mention the true damage users like Vayne, Darius, Chogath Etc. He has a lot of issues as his kit is ancient, but he's still fun as hell to play, hopefully this % damage buff will make him a little more popular against tanks, as its one of his strengths.

> [{quoted}](name=Silents429,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2VlARnXR,comment-id=000b00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-14T18:26:02.719+0000)

> 
> And what problems does he have? His only job is to run around and be an annoying pain in the ass, which he excels at greatly.

This is not his only job.  He has a late-game job.  Which is to run in, grab someone under turret, which creates a pick, that turns the game into a 4v5.  

There is nothing more back-breaking in a Game of LOL than watching a heat-seeking Singed Pop Ghost, R, Dive-Helmet {{item:3800}} and streak in from the backline to pick off your ADC and melt him.  Then go right back to splitting. 

This Buff gives Singed Dueling strength against Tanky Toplanes that just scale to a point where neither players gives a damn about the other.  

It's a pretty boring way to play League where you farm your wave, he farms his, and you spam /laugh at eachother while the other is doing his thing.  

Or even worse, the Singed has decided to Proxy Farm so they just ignore eachother in lane.  The E Buff is sort of a deterrent to proxy farming because the Singed now has a dueling trading tool that rewards good flip/skyautoattack/poison management.

Or his more annoying role, split push lanes.

You can rape him in lane, but he is just going to go back and proxy farm, and just like Nasus, he WILL become a monster late game, and all you are doing is delaying the inevitable. 

We shouldn't have the only real way to deal with singed be simply to ignore him, since chasing him is fruitless, and his ult makes it obnoxious to kill him.
